Title: Joshoku kaiko tewaza-gusa, shi, go, roku・・ｻﾂﾂ・・ｻ・ｽ･・ｽｳ・・ｻ・ｽｹ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽ･・ｽｭ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻﾂﾂ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ~・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｭ (Women Engaged in the Sericulture Industry, Nos. 4-6)
Description: Colour woodblock-printed triptych. Three sheets from twelve-sheet composition. Three stages of silk production by female workers: Re-activating worms after sleep, feeding larvae with mulberry leaves, putting cocoons on trays. Nishiki-e on paper. Inscribed, signed and marked.

Title: Shimotsuke Kurokami-yama Kirifuri no taki / Kanto Meisho Zue
Description: Woodblock print. Rural landscape. Kirifuri Falls, at Kurokami-yama. Nishiki-e on paper.

Title: drawing
Description: Sketch. Chinese lion with front legs together. Ink on paper. Inscribed.

Title: Kannazuki ・・ｻ・ｽ･・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽ｡・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ (Tenth Month) / Bijin juni shi・・ｻﾂﾂ・・ｻ・ｽｾ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｺ・ｽｺ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｺ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｧ・ｽｿ (Twelve Forms of Beauty)
Description: Print. Girl by an open window in the rain. One of a set of prints for the twelve months. Colour woodblock printed.

Title: painting
Description: Sketch. Warrior attacking tiger. Ink on paper.

Title: Ju Senju kagai yori chobo no Fuji ・・ｻ・ｽｾ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｽ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｱ・・ｻ・ｽ｡・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｺ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｸ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｺ・・ｻ (Fuji Seen in the Distance from Senju Pleasure Quarter) / Fugaku sanjurokkei ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｨ・・ｻ・ｽｶ・ｽｽ・・ｻ・ｽｸ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｭ・・ｻ・・ｻ・ｽｯ (Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji)
Description: Colour woodblock oban print. Procession of 'alternate attendance' passing Senju in autumn: Gun-carriers' muskets sheathed in red cases; decorated tips of the spear-bearers' weapons behind trees; sandals hanging under eaves at roadside tea-stall straw; two women seated on raised path through harvested fields; Mt Fuji covered with snow in distance. Nishiki-e on paper. Inscribed and signed.

Title: print
Description: Colour woodblock print. Bijinga. Okita of Naniwaya at her shop; young woman serving tea; older woman seated on beanch; with lantern and curtains; with poems. Nishiki-e on paper. Signed , inscribed and marked.

Title: print
Description: Woodblock print. Actor Ichikawa Danjuro II as Soga no Sukeroku, Nakamura Takesaburo as Agemaki, in play Shikirei yawaragi Sogata. Inscribed, signed, sealed and marked.

Title: Suzumi no hotaru / Shiki no yukan
Description: Woodblock print, triptych. Three girls with fans by a stream on summer evening; girl holding box for catching fireflies. Nishiki-e on paper.

Title: Keisei mitate hakkei (Courtesans Viewed as the Eight Views) / Yamato hakkei - Miho matsubara (Eight Views of Japan - Miho matsubara)
Description: Woodblock print. Bijinga. Natori of the Sugata-Ebiya standing in front of tokonoma with paper in hands, inset view of Miho. Nishiki-e on paper.

Title: drawing
Description: Sketch. Man lifting sake cask with one arm. Ink on paper.

Title: Jin / Five Virtues
Description: Woodblock print. Bijinga. A girl shaving her younger sister's neck. Nishiki-e on paper.
